    • Method Detail

      • createInternalConstraints

        protected Constraint[] createInternalConstraints(Variable from,
                                     Variable to)
        Description copied from class: MultiBinaryConstraint
        This method must be defined to create the internal constraints underlying this MultiBinaryConstraint.
        Specified by:
        createInternalConstraints in class MultiBinaryConstraint
        Parameters:
        from - The source Variable of the MultiConstraint.
        to - The destination Variable of the MultiConstraint.
        Returns:
        An array of lower-level constraints which "implement" this MultiBinaryConstraint.

      • clone

        public java.lang.Object clone()
        Description copied from class: MultiConstraint
        A MultiConstraint must be cloneable. This is used by the MultiConstraintSolver class to instantiate proper constraints to delegate its underlying ConstraintSolvers.
        Specified by:
        clone in class MultiConstraint

      • getEdgeLabel

        public java.lang.String getEdgeLabel()
        Description copied from class: Constraint
        Every Constraint should implement this method - its value is what is drawn by the ConstraintNetwork rendering methods.
        Specified by:
        getEdgeLabel in class Constraint
        Returns:
        a String representation of the constraint to be used for ConstraintNetwork rendering.

      • getBounds

        public Bounds[] getBounds()

      • isEquivalent

        public boolean isEquivalent(Constraint c)
        Description copied from class: Constraint
        Method for assessing the "equivalence" between two constraints. This is not used for lookups nor comparisons (hence, it is not the equals method).
        Specified by:
        isEquivalent in class Constraint
        Parameters:
        c - The Constraint to compare against.
        Returns:
        true iff the two constraints are considered to be equivalent.
